Crown.Name: Brave Leader
Crown.Effect: If able, the user sacrifices an amount of HP equal to the roll to gain the same amount as a shield that lasts until the beginning of the user's next turn. This can only be used if the user doesn't already have a shield from Brave Leader. Effects that depend on the user having a shield from Brave Leader last only until the shield is broken or expires.

Crown.Name: Engage
Crown.Effect: If the user has a shield from Brave Leader, they heal for half of the shield's value.

Crown.Name: Ambush
Crown.Effect: If the user has a shield from Brave Leader, attacks targeting the user lose 1 dice. Otherwise, this attack has +1 dice.

Crown.Name: Diversion
Crown.Effect: If the user has a shield from Brave Leader, they have +2 EVAs.

Crown.Name: Bastion
Crown.Effect: This turn, Brave Leader generates 50% more shield than usual.

Crown.Name: War of Attrition
Crown.Effect: If the user has a shield from Brave Leader, any Foe who hits them in the next round is immediately (before damage is dealt) inflicted 5 Bleed/1.

Crown.Name: Blockade
Crown.Effect: This move is immune to outside factors to damage. Do not add ATK. If the user has a shield from Brave Leader, the shield expires one turn later than it normally would and the user has +1 MP.

Crown.Name: Divide et Impera
Crown.Effect: If the user has a shield from Brave Leader, they lose the shield to gain an equivalent amount of DR for the rest of the shield's duration. For the purposes of move effects, having this DR is considered as having a shield from Brave Leader.

Crown.Name: War Cry
Crown.Effect: If the user has a shield from Brave Leader, allies in range gain a shield of equal value that lasts for one round. This move may be used as a non-damaging standard.

Crown.Name: Shock and Awe
Crown.Effect: If the user has a shield from Brave Leader, attacks targeting them are immune to positive outside factors to accuracy and damage.

Crown.Name: Last Stand
Crown.Effect: The user gains a Shield/1 equal to the amount of shield they have generated with Brave Leader until the beginning of this turn.

Runes.Name: Echoes of Time
Runes.Effect: Damage over Time (DoT) effects deal damage at the start of the affected Entity's turn and last for the specified duration, even if the user dies. All DoT effects are rolled each time they deal damage. The user can only inflict a Foe with one new DoT effect per turn.

Runes.Name: Galdr
Runes.Effect: This move inflicts 2d6+2 DoT on the original target for 2 rounds.

Runes.Name: Astral Projection
Runes.Effect: This move deals no damage. On hit, inflict the targets with DoT equal to the roll for one round. This move is immune to outside damage factors. Only add half MAG.

Runes.Name: Jera
Runes.Effect: Before accuracy, the user's active DoT effects on the target are extended by 1 round. On hit, the target takes double damage from the user's DoT for 1 round. Do not add MAG.

Runes.Name: Oath of Harmony
Runes.Effect: Whenever the target attacks a foe, they heal 15% of the damage dealt. When hitting multiple foes, only heal for 15% of the highest damage dealt to one. Only one target can be affected at a time. This effect only ends once the target dies, and does not stack.

Runes.Name: Oath of Discord
Runes.Effect: The target takes 10% more damage from all attacks. Only one target can be affected at a time. This effect only ends once the target dies, and does not stack.

Runes.Name: Sealed Fate
Runes.Effect: This move inflicts 2d4+5 DoT on the targets for 2 rounds. If neither hit misses a target, that target has -1 Evasions until this move's DoT expires.

Runes.Name: Hagalaz
Runes.Effect: This move deals no damage. On hit, inflict the target with DoT equal to the roll for 2 rounds. This move is immune to outside damage factors. Do not add MAG.

Runes.Name: Crippling Ailment
Runes.Effect: Choose Isaz or Kenaz. Isaz: Homing 5. The target is inflicted with -2 EVAs/1 and -3 DR/1. Kenaz: Line 5. The user's active DoT effects on the target are extended by 1 round. Until those DoT effects expire, the target is inflicted with -2 ACC and -3 DMG.

Runes.Name: Inveita
Runes.Effect: The target is healed for the amount rolled. As a Standard, add the user's MAG to the roll.

Runes.Name: Magic Circle
Runes.Effect: For one round, the user and allies in range have +2 MP, deal an additional 20% attack damage to targets affected by the user's Oath of Discord, and heal an additional 30% of damage dealt with attacks while affected by the user's Oath of Harmony.

Runes.Name: Ragnarök
Runes.Effect: This attack gains +damage equal to one quarter of the damage the user has dealt to foes with DoT this game.

Talisman.Name: Solomon's Wisdom
Talisman.Effect: The target gains 1d8+5 damage to their next attack. A player cannot gain this buff again if they currently have this buff. Only two players can have this buff from the user at the same time (self and one ally).

Talisman.Name: Smite
Talisman.Effect: This attack gains 1 die if the target has used or received a buff at any point during the game.

Talisman.Name: Enlighten
Talisman.Effect: This move can be used when an ally in range attacks or is attacked, before accuracy is rolled. The user's non-permanent buffs are transferred to the target for the rest of their duration. The target is also healed 5 HP.

Talisman.Name: Blessing of Kings
Talisman.Effect: The user gains +1 ACC and +3 DR for one round.

Talisman.Name: Purify
Talisman.Effect: The target heals the amount rolled and all the debuffs on the target are removed

Talisman.Name: Divine Merit
Talisman.Effect: 10% of the damage dealt by this attack is gained as +DMG for 1 round.

Talisman.Name: Indulgence
Talisman.Effect: The target gains two of the following buffs (chosen by the user) for one round: +2 ACC, +5 DR, +3 DMG, +2 Crit Range. The player cannot gain this buff again if they currently have this buff.

Talisman.Name: Tempting Fate
Talisman.Effect: The user is inflicted with -3 DMG and -1 ACC for one round. If the user rolls 16+ on accuracy on one of the hits, these effects are negated. If the user rolls 16+ on accuracy on both hits, the debuffs are instead inverted.

Talisman.Name: Absolution
Talisman.Effect: Before accuracy, the user loses all of their buffs and cannot gain any until the start of their next turn.

Talisman.Name: Siphon
Talisman.Effect: Before accuracy, the target's non-permanent buffs are transferred to the user.

Talisman.Name: Echo of Light
Talisman.Effect: After this move deals damage, the user's non-multiplicative buffs obtained through the user's Talisman abilities are doubled and extended by one round. These buffs may not be further increased in duration until their effects end.
